## IdentifiableObject type

Abstract base class for all objects that can be identified using a "TCM URI"&amp;gt;.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type IdentifiableObject = {
    $type?: string;
    Id: string;
    Title?: string;
    ApplicableActions?: Array<HateoasLink>;
    ExtensionProperties?: ExtensionPropertyDictionary;
    IsEditable?: boolean;
    ListInfo?: ListInfo;
    ListLinks?: Array<HateoasLink>;
    LoadInfo?: LoadInfo;
    SecurityDescriptor?: SecurityDescriptor;
    VersionInfo?: BasicVersionInfo;
};
```
